profil.deskripsi: I am a Web Developer with experience in designing and developing efficient and intuitive digital solutions. With a strong background in technology, I focus on creating optimal user experiences through modern and responsive approaches. My expertise includes crafting engaging and functional user interfaces, as well as managing projects from concept to implementation. I thrive in collaborative environments, with strong communication skills and a creative problem-solving mindset. Detail-oriented and quality-driven, I always strive to deliver exceptional results that meet client and user needs. I am eager to join a dynamic team where I can continue to grow professionally and contribute to meaningful technological innovations.

pendidikan.deskripsi: I am currently pursuing my studies at the University of Brawijaya, a leading institution in Indonesia. I am enrolled in the Information Systems program. During this time, I focus on developing both technical and theoretical skills relevant to Software Development, while actively participating in academic activities and projects that broaden my knowledge and experience.

During my time in vocational high school, I studied various aspects of software development, from basic programming to software project management. I gained skills in system analysis, design, development, and testing of applications. My education also equipped me with a solid understanding of the software development lifecycle and enhanced my problem-solving abilities. Additionally, I learned the importance of teamwork and proper documentation in every technological project.

pengalamanKerja.deskripsi:
As an Intern Backend Developer, I gained experience working with development teams to build and maintain reliable backend infrastructures. My key responsibilities included:

  • Developing and managing APIs to ensure smooth communication systems.
  • Working with databases, including design, optimization, and query management to enhance application performance.
  • Performing debugging and testing to identify and resolve bugs.
  • Collaborating with the team to ensure effective integration between systems.
  • Participating in code reviews and adhering to best practices in development.

This experience has given me a solid understanding of backend workflows, as well as the importance of security and scalability in application development.
